content.question: Which of the following best explains how the pattern of <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> arrangement in chromosomes could be used, in most cases, to determine if an organism was a prokaryote or a eukaryote?

choices.label: Prokaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Eukaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Single circular chromosome Multiple circular chromosomes

Prokaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Eukaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Multiple chromosomes Single chromosome

Prokaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Eukaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Single linear chromosome Multiple linear chromosomes

Prokaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Eukaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Single circular chromosome Multiple linear chromosomes

content.answer: Prokaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Eukaryotic <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Single circular chromosome Multiple linear chromosomes

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
